summary: Handle JSONDecodeError in TodoStorage.load() with clear ValueError including file path

changes.description: Wrap json.loads() in try/except to catch JSONDecodeError and raise ValueError with file path and error message
Add comprehensive regression tests for JSON parse error scenarios

risks: Error message format changed from raw JSONDecodeError to ValueError with custom message
limitations: Only handles JSONDecodeError - other I/O errors still propagate raw
acceptance_criteria_met: When JSON file is corrupted, program raises ValueError (not crash)
Error message includes file path and corruption reason
Unit tests cover JSON parse failure scenarios
